attributes.action: To make Britain a true democracy and abolish the monarchy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is a great and forward looking nation in most respects except one, the medieval instituions of monarchy and the House of Lords. I'm proud of Britain's heritage, history and the roll we've played on the European and World stage and of the history of British monarchy, but if we're going to move into the 21st century it is time for change and for these institution to be scrapped in favour of a democratically elected President and senate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
